Package com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    The account used by a user once they have logged in or signed up.
    AccountManager
    AccountManager interacts with the server to update and fetch accounts.
    Accounts
    The Accounts class fetches how many users are on the server (?)
    AddBookScreen
    This activity is for creating books to add to the account's inventory for trading.
    AddCommentsScreen
    Allows the user to add comments to a book they are making/editing.
    BitmapScaler
    BitMapScaler helps to scale down the bitmaps.
    Book
    The Book class creates instances of a book which contain the various information about the book the user would like to trade.
    BookListAdapter
    The Booklist Adapter is used to display the list of books in a listview.
    BuildConfig  
    ConnectionCheck
    ConnectionCheck checks for connection to the internet throughout the app.
    ContextProvider
    This class provides the application context.
    CounterTradeScreen
    This activity creates the countertrade screen where the user can create a counter trade against the friend.
    CreateTradeScreen
    This activity begins a trade with the friend whose page you are currently on.
    EditBookActivity
    EditBookActivity allows for the user to modify the information in one of their own books they had made.
    FRAdapter
    an adapter for friend requests with the sender's name shown
    FriendProfileScreen
    This activity is to display the chosen friend from the list of friends that your account has made.
    FriendRequest
    holds individual friend requests by sender, receiver, and status
    FriendRequestManager
    keeps track of all friendrequests
    FriendRequests
    A list of FriendRequests
    Friends
    A list of Accounts that act as the friend list for the user.
    FriendsAdapter
    The Friendlist Adapter is used to display the list of your friends in a listview.
    FriendsScreen
    This activity allows or searching the server for other registered users which can be added as friends to trade with.
    GMailSender  
    HistoryOfTradesScreen
    The HistoryOfTrades Screen displays the current trades the user has with other users, as well as the past trades and their results.
    Hits<T>
    Hits grabs the hits.
    HomeScreen
    Once the user is signed in or signed up, they are taken to this screen.
    Inventory
    This class handles the user's inventory.
    JSSEProvider  
    MainActivity
    The first screen the user sees when running the app.
    NumberManager
    holds a number on the server and updates it when called
    OptionsActivity
    OptionsActivity is for setting the photo downloads as enabled/disabled.
    PhotoActivity
    PhotoActivity allows the user to look at the image listed for their book.
    PhotoDownloads
    PhotoDownloads is a global boolean variable to check whether photo downloads are enabled or disabled.
    Photos
    Will be restricted to having 5 photos - no ading your entire life story in pictures! >:0 Created by jlovas on 11/13/15.
    ProcessTradeScreen
    ProcessTradeScreen displays the information about a trade the user is having with a friend.
    ProfileScreen
    Activity representing the view of a user account details.
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.array  
    R.attr

    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    SaveLoad
    Saves and loads the Account to the SD card using gson into a file called "file.sav"
    SearchFriendInventories
    Allows the user to search the inventories of their friends by textual query OR category
    SearchHit<T>
    Searches the hits
    SearchResponse<T>
    Contains a collection of Hits returned form a search.
    SelectCounterBooksActivity
    This activity allows for the selection of counter items against a friend.
    SelectFromBorrowerInventoryActivity
    Activity where the user (as an owner) selects the Book to trade upon creating a trade (from the borrower's inventory) Contains a ListView of the borrower's inventory where the user chooses a book by clicking on the item.
    SelectFromOwnerInventoryActivity
    Activity where the user (as an owner) selects the Book to trade upon creating a trade.
    SignUpActivity
    Activity where the user creates an account.
    SimpleSearchCommand
    Implementation of search by Textual query.
    TopTraderActivity
    An activity for displaying the top traders using the app.
    TopTraderTrackManager
    This class helps to manage the top traders by whoever has the most trades.
    TRAdapter
    Manages trade requests between users.
    Trade
    Trade is a class that represents a trade between a borrower and an owner.
    TradeHistory
    Holds all the trades ever because a history of trades is everything Current and past trades, as specified in OS 20.
    TradeHistoryListAdapter
    An Array Adapter used to populate the TradeHistory ListView.
    TradeRequest
    Holds individual Trade request by sender, receiver and Status
    TradeRequestManager
    Created by ljuarezr on 11/25/15.
    TradeRequests
    Created by ljuarezr on 11/26/15.
    TutActivity
    This activity displays the tutorial images, depending on where you enter from (previous screen had buttons).
    TutorialActivity
    This activity displays buttons for the tutorial to be displayed.
    UniqueNumber
    Holds the unique number for each book (each book has a unique number).
    UniqueNumberGenerator
    Creates a unique number for each book
    UserNameHolder
    Created by chen1 on 11/29/15.
    UsernameManager
    Created by chen1 on 11/29/15.
    ViewBookActivity
    Activity for viewing a book, including all of its attributes.
    ViewFRActivity
    checks the server and shows you all of your friend requests
    ViewTradeActivity
    Activity for viewing a trade's borrower and Owner basic information (username), and the books up for trading, along with the comments provided.
    ViewTradeRequest
    checks the server and shows you all of your friend requests
  • Enum Summary

    Category
    This class is an enum for the categories of books.
    TradeCompletion
    This class is an enum for the trade completion (current/complete)
